com.marklogic.hub.impl

Interface Scaffolding

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScaffoldingImpl

    public interface Scaffolding
    Interface that handles the management of DHF projects on disk Includes creating entities, flows, rest extensions, and transforms for an already initialized project
    See Also:
    for the initialization of the project itself to disk

        void createCustomModule(java.lang.String stepName,
                        java.lang.String stepType,
                        java.lang.String format)
        Creates a custom module given a string stepName
        Parameters:
        stepName - - the name of the step as string
        stepType - - the type of the step as string
        format - - the format of the custom module (allowed values are xqy, sjs)
